about_the_game:
You are the manager of a game studio. Decisions on the cards determine the future of the studio. Strive to keep the studio standing for many years. A journey awaits you with artificial intelligences and aliens. Yes, you heard it right, aliens are real and artificial intelligence is poised to take over the world. Grow your game company and be the best. Are you ready for an epic adventure that spans generations?

Key Features:


Game Development:
Develop and test different games at every stage. Rate your game and win awards, including the prestigious "Game of the Year."
  • Dive into various genres, unleash your creativity, and strive for excellence.
  • Compete with other studios, earn recognition, and become the ultimate game developer.

Direct Your Path with Swipe:
Make swift decisions, swipe cards, and mold the future of your studio.
  • Every move matters, every choice impacts the destiny of your studio.
  • Set your strategy, expand your studio, and establish dominance in the industry.

Studio Management:
Embark on an adventure starting from your garage, evolving your game development journey into a major gaming corporation.
  • Hire new talent, discover their skills, and strengthen your team.
  • Elevate the quality of your games through development, aiming for industry leadership.

Swipe Your Way to Success in 'CEO Tycoon: My Game Studio':
Navigate critical statistics of your studio ,Employees, Gamers, Quality, and Money strategically, leading your company to industry dominance.
  • Swipe cards left and right, make decisions, and shape the future of your game studio.
  • Choose wisely; the fate of your studio rests in your hands!

Rich and Immersive Narrative:
Experience a rich and immersive game story, starting from the garage and stretching into space.
  • Witness the rise and fall of your own game studio.
  • Dive into historical and fantastical events, embarking on a journey into the depths of the gaming world.
